TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpRuntime extends System.Object

summary.span: 为当前应用程序提供一组 ASP.NET 运行时服务。

span.span: Provides a set of ASP.NET run-time services for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用在处理 HTTP 请求的 ASP.NET 管道模型开头。The object is used at the beginning of the ASP.NET pipeline model that processes HTTP requests. 方法驱动器处理所有后续的 ASP.NET Web。The method drives all subsequent ASP.NET Web processing. 页面开发人员可以使用类属性，若要了解有关当前应用程序域的信息以进行诊断，例如。Page developers can use the class properties to find out information about the current application domain for diagnostic purposes, for example. 创建自定义进程管道或自定义宿主环境的开发人员应调用方法从类派生自或类。Developers creating custom process pipeline or a custom hosting environment should call the method from a class derived from the or class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取属性的类表示的当前应用程序域并将其显示到浏览器。The following example demonstrates how to get properties of the class representing the current application domain and display them to the browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/CS/systemwebhttpruntime.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebHttpRuntime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebHttpRuntime/VB/systemwebhttpruntime.vb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 页和 ASP.NET Web 应用程序中的应用程序上下文

span.span: Page and Application Context in ASP.NET Web Applications

summary.span: 获取 所在的应用程序域的应用程序标识。

span.span: Gets the application identification of the application domain where the exists.

value.span: 所在的应用程序域的应用程序标识。

span.span: The application identification of the application domain where the exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AppDomainAppID` 唯一标识该应用程序。`AppDomainAppID` uniquely identifies the application. 它不会更改后重新启动该应用程序并创建一个新的应用程序域。It does not change after the application is restarted and a new application domain is created.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetFramework As Version
public: static property Version ^ TargetFramework { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 Web 应用程序目标的 .NET Framework 的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

value.span: 当前 Web 应用程序目标的 .NET Framework 的版本。

span.span: The version of the .NET Framework that the current web application targets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常通过设置`targetFramework`属性的`httpRuntime`Web.config 文件中的元素。This property is normally set by using the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element in the Web.config file. 此属性不保证返回正确值，如果 currentapplication 域不是 ASP.NET 应用程序域。This property is not guaranteed to return a correct value if the currentapplication domain is not an ASP.NET application domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void UnloadAppDomain() cil managed

summary.span: 终止当前应用程序。

span.span: Terminates the current application.

summary.span: 应用程序在下次接收到请求时重新启动。

span.span: The application restarts the next time a request is received for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnloadAppDomain` 对于有大量不常接收请求的应用程序的服务器非常有用。`UnloadAppDomain` is useful for servers that have a large number of applications that infrequently receive requests. 而不是使应用程序资源的进程的生存期内保持活动状态`UnloadAppDomain`允许以编程方式关闭未使用的应用程序。Rather than keep application resources alive for the lifetime of the process, `UnloadAppDomain` allows programmatic shutdown of unused applications.
